text: (annanpar kuriyavare) avanutaiya vilai porul (celvam)anaittum alintana. Attottattin marankal, cetikal (akiya anaittum) atiyutan cayntu vittana. Akave, avarril avan celavu ceytataip parri tan iru kaikalaip picaintu kontan. (Marumaiyil iraivan mun avan kontuvarappatumpotu) â€˜â€˜en iraivanukku nan evaraiyum inaiyakkamal iruntirukka ventume?'' Enru (kaicetappattu) kuruvan
